sentences.sCn: 这消息我是间接听来的。

sentences.sContent: So it tries to control them indirectly.
sentences.sContent_eng: So it tries to control them indirectly.
sentences.sCn: 因此它试图间接地控制它们。

sentences.sContent: You are also indirectly predicting the future of your project/process when you choose and configure the process for your project.
sentences.sContent_eng: You are also indirectly predicting the future of your project/process when you choose and configure the process for your project.
sentences.sCn: 当您为您的项目选择和配置这个过程时同样要间接地预知您的项目/过程的未来。

words.tran: 间接的；迂回的；非直截了当的
